short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: _blank is a chrome extension that makes every link you click open in a new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of links opening in the same tab and disrupting what you were working on? Say hello to _blank

With _blank, you can open links from various websites in a new tab effortlessly. Customize your experience by choosing to open all links in new tabs or selectively opening links from specific websites. 

Stay organized and keep your workflow uninterrupted!
